alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Avery; Caldwell Mountains; Greater Caldwell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 8:43PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Alexander, northern Caldwell and southeastern Avery Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 843 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southwest of Blowing Rock, or 4 miles southwest of Blowing Rock In Caldwell County, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blowing Rock In Caldwell County, Cedar Rock, Grandfather Mountain State Park, B.R. Parkway-Linville Falls To Grandfather, Edgemont, Kings Creek, Globe, Patterson, Upton and Ellendale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Alexander; Avery; Caldwell Mountains; Greater Caldwell
